label: pickUpAvailabilityDateTime
comment: The formatted date, time, date time, or other date time value, at header level, when this trade delivery is available for pick-up.
The formatted date, time, date time, or other date time value, at line level, when this delivery is available for pick-up.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
